players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "Alice, your claim is serious. Charlie, how do you respond to Alice's accusation?"
Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night. She is the mafioso trying to frame me. Don't believe her lies."
You: "I am the detective. Charlie is lying. I have proof he is mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "I am the detective. Alice is lying to save herself. I investigated her, she is mafia. Trust me, vote Alice."
Bob: "Alice and Charlie are both accusing each other of being mafia, but only one can be telling the truth. We need more evidence before deciding who to vote out."

Alice: "I am the detective. Charlie is lying. I have proof he is mafia. Vote Charlie."

Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
